data.message: So fed up with coming on his profile and seing all these haters and attention seekers,bad mouthing him but have his photos all over their profile 😒 he took a brake,cut him some slack and let him be...who are you to judge him? Are you better? You dont have a past,and are all saints? Please get over yourselves and if you don't like him just let him be,a fan is a fan good or bad times,happy or sad ones...if you swear,and curse and bad mouth him or others are you gonna get a trophy? Is your life gonna change dramatically because in you doing so? NO...all of you need a reality check...you look ridiculous and he's not gonna give you a standing ovation...seriously I am turned off by all this constant insults and bad mouthing,his page is not a contest to whom is insulting him the most just because he took a brake or has a game released,or decided to sell memorabilia ,this page is for fans...not haters and bullies,that I dont get why are on here in the first place ...oh yes, except for a cheap show off and attention seeking....😒

replies.message: None of you have any respect towards him what so ever...he has been bullied most of his life and insulted and trashed...well done to all of you for reminding him of that...great people you all are!!!😒
1.you've got serious problems and 2. Do your own post and stop commenting crap on others posts  if not related Katherine Tobar....you racist weirdo!!!
